short.subtitle: Full Stack Developer | Backend Focused
short.description: Developing scalable web and APIs  with .NET and Python.
short.description2: Avanced Systems Engineering student focused on clean architecture and best practices.
about.paragraph1: I analyze problems taking into account accessibility. I enjoy teamwork and learning from my teammates. I'm used to helping people and sharing knowledge. Also, I'm always learning new skills.
about.paragraph2: I'm a Systems Engineering student at UTN FRLP. At university, I have developed soft skills like teamwork, leadership, communication and problem-solving. Furthermore, the SOLID principles are the foundation of all my projects.
